## Problem Statement

What user/workflow problem does this solve?

## Proposed Solution

Describe the expected behavior or command UX.

## Alternatives Considered

What else did you consider?

## Security/Abuse Considerations

Could this be abused or expose sensitive data?

## Additional Context

Links, examples, or API dependencies.
